sourcesContent:
Animais:

  • Nome: {{ animal.name }} - tipo: {{ animal.type }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; interface TypeAnimals { name: string; type: string; } @Component({ selector: 'app-list-render', templateUrl: './list-render.component.html', styleUrls: ['./list-render.component.scss'], }) export class ListRenderComponent { animals: TypeAnimals[] = [ { name: 'Turca', type: 'Dog' }, { name: 'Tom', type: 'Cat' }, { name: 'Frida', type: 'Dog' }, { name: 'Bob', type: 'Dog' }, ]; }
